name: BlockRemit
description: Introducing BlockRemit, a supercharged plug-in for your wallet, enabling extra features such as the ability to request payments from other wallets, private cross-chain transactions and an MEV-protected DEX experience. BlockRemit Platform Features - supports ANY wallet - private cross-chain transactions (where your sending address is not revealed) - Paypal like request for payment from wallets - MEV bot protected DEX - NFT viewer on 10+ chains, including features like floor price, last sale time and ability to instantly trade NFTs within the app BlockRemit is powered by $REMIT, the utility token required to use BlockRemit's privacy sending and MEV protection features. On day 1, all features will be free to use, but afterwards will require holding $REMIT tokens. Upcoming Features - private same chain transactions - nametags for sending and receiving crypto (similar to ENS, airdropped to top holders)
